meanings: (소중히 여기다) care for, take (good) care of
for the benefit of the public

meanings.meaning: for the sake of something/of doing something

vlive.korean: [껌딱지 보호] 건조하니까~ 목 상태를 위해서~ [Protecting my SOOBIN] It's for our throat conditions. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Protecting my SOOBIN] It's for our throat conditions.

vlive.korean: 그럼 다녀오세요 저는 이제 러브들을 위해서 - 저도 여기 좀 있을게요 - 좀 있을 거예요? Then please go, I will stay here for L.O.Λ.E. - I also will stay here. - You will be here? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🍫🍫🍫🍫🍫
vlive.english: Then please go, I will stay here for L.O.Λ.E. - I also will stay here. - You will be here?

vlive.korean: 여러분을 위해서요! I'm back for you guys! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 53 - SEASON 2
잘 넘겼네 - 송윤형을 위해서 불길에 뛰어들 수 있어요? Great job. - Can you dive into fire for SONG? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: Great job. - Can you dive into fire for SONG?

vlive.korean: 근데 대학 생활을 원활하게 하기 위해서 왜 옷을 사야 하죠? But why do you need clothes for your campus life? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: But why do you need clothes for your campus life?

examples.korean: The translation sacrifices naturalness for the sake of accuracy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 번역은 정확성을 기하기 위해서 자연스러움을 희생시키고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The translation sacrifices naturalness for the sake of accuracy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Firefighters needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소방관들이 불타고 있는 그 집에 들어가기 위해서는 산소 호흡기가 필요했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Firefighters needed breathing apparatus to enter the burning house. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Breathable, waterproof clothing is essential for most outdoor sports. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대부분의 실외 스포츠 활동을 위해서는 통기성이 있고 방수가 되는 옷감이 필수적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Breathable, waterproof clothing is essential for most outdoor sports. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I made it especially for you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 특별히 너를 위해서 그것을 만들었어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I made it especially for you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can do it. Please, for my sake. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 할 수 있어. 제발 날 위해서 해 줘. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can do it. Please, for my sake. Add to Wordbook
